species.name: porygon
descriptions: A man-made Pokémon created using advanced scientific means. It can move freely in cyberspace.
A manmade Pokémon that came about as a result of research. It is programmed with only basic motions.
An artificial Pokémon created due to extensive research, it can perform only what is in its program.
In recent years, this species has been very helpful in cyberspace. These Pokémon will go around checking to make sure no suspicious data exists.
It can convert its body into digital data, which enables it to enter cyberspace.

abilities.name: trace
abilities.effect: Copies an opponent's ability upon entering battle.

abilities.name: download
abilities.effect: Raises the attack stat corresponding to the opponents' weaker defense one stage upon entering battle.

abilities.name: analytic
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.
